name: Cosmo II Side Table
description: The Cosmo II side table by Kifu Paris is a whimsical and sculptural piece, inlaid in black Shagreen, black pen shell and bronze-patina brass. The amorphous shapes on the bottom part can be moved to adjust the angle of each part. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans, the designer calls this finish 'coal black' shagreen.
